attributes.action: Research into the cause and prevention of Endometriosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many women suffer from Endometriosis and suffer considerable pain and problems conceiving, most doctors do not recognise sypmtoms and research on how Endo can be prevented is seriously under funded so we would ask for the government to invest more money into this research.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Research into the cause and prevention of Endometriosis."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15015.asp

Prime Minister's Office
